item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 23rd September
item.description:
Please can you send a tree letter to dunally school Cheltenham asking them to cut back their overgrown tree branches hanging over the footway in Union Street side back to their boundary unable to post a letter but have spoken to someone there an asked them over the fence 23/09/25
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road repairs not to a food standard, 23rd September
item.description:
Repairs to an uneven road surface have made it even worse. Infact, almost embarrassing works carried out. It won't be long until a crash happens as moving vehicles are thrown off balance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole, looks to be about 12 inches x 30inches in size and quite deep, 23rd September
item.description:
The pot hole looks to be located outside 14 abbots leys road, GL54 5QE. I was told a lorry turned its wheels and dug up the tarmac and overtime the pothole has got worse. It won'r be long before someone trips into the road as it is close to a school and lots of children run down the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbots Leys Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
